# Glory to the Filmmaker Award

The Glory to the Filmmaker Award, organized by the Venice Film Festival in collaboration with Jaeger-LeCoultre (2006-2020) and Cartier (2021-today), is dedicated to personalities who have made a significant contribution to contemporary cinema.
